   - If the product is low quality (with value to you as $0), the net loss would be $10,000.

   - Expected value = $1,500 - $4,000

Given the negative expected utility based on the historical data provided, despite the 60% probability of receiving a high-quality product after purchasing, it appears financially unfavorable to buy the product in this situation.
